caption.p: TLR2/4‐dependent macrophage activation by HMR. RAW264.7 cells were pretreated with C29 (100 μM) or TAK‐242 (5 μM) for 2 hr and then co‐treated with HMR (50 μg/ml) for 24 hr. NO level (a) and mRNA level (b) were investigated using Griess assay and RT‐PCR, respectively. * p < .05 compared to the cells without the treatment. # p < .05 compared to the cells with HMR treatment alone
